title: SMM Perimeter Builder
unionErrorText:
You have to select exactly two perimeters to unify them _FR 
Press the shift key to select more perimeters _FR
deleteErrorText: You have to select at least one perimeter to delete it _FR
downloadErrorText: You have to draw at least one perimeter befor download _FR
enterFilename:
Please enter the file name, only letters and numbers are allowed! 
The output file will be a KML FR
kmlImportError: Imported file is not a valid KML _FR
safariSupportError: Safari browser is not supported, some features might not work _FR
noIntersection: The selected polygons do not perimeters, union can't be made_FR
notPerpendicularError: Perimeter lines are not perpendicular FR
noPerimeterErrorText: You have to select at least one perimeter _FR
noScaleErrorText: You have to select at least one scale _FR
alertOutside100:
The perimeter is completly outside from the 100'000 scale 
You should consider to move the perimeter in Switzerland _FR
perimeterScale1: Perimeter is partially outside form the FR
perimeterScale2: scale, some regions will not be downloaded, do you wish to adapt the perimeter to the FR
setScaleTitle: Select at least one scale FR
outsideFenceError: You can't draw outsde the white line FR
helpImport: Drag und drop KML file in the browser to import a perimeter FR
helpShiftSelect: Press the shift key to select multiple perimeters Fr
helpDeleteKey: Press the ESC key to delet a drawn line (while drawing) Fr
helpSelectAll: Press A to select all feature (in Drag mode) FR
